answers.answer: I have a 10 month old with Type 1 Diabetes.  A normal range is considered 80 to 180 (fasting/first thing in AM or taken 2 hrs after eating).Maybe she just needs more rest.  Does she get a morning nap and an afternoon one?Things to watch for with Diabetes is if she starts drinking more than normal and peeing a lot (my son would absolutely saturate his diapers... we actually moved him up in to a bigger size than called for to prevent leaks, before we knew what his problem was).

question: I have a 8th month old baby, after eating she falls asleep before i can get her cleaned up and out of her chair ,she  has been sleeping a lot and both her father and i have problems with are blood sugar I checked her sugar tonight and it was 150. Is this normal? What is the normal range for a baby?
title: sleepy baby
